com.webreach.mirth.model.CodeTemplate.name: Invoke Target Grid and Compile Response
getIHubDatabaseConnection
com.webreach.mirth.model.CodeTemplate.tooltip: Returns database connection for caBIG Integration Hub

com.webreach.mirth.model.CodeTemplate.name: aggregateBroadcastResponse
com.webreach.mirth.model.CodeTemplate.tooltip: Generic Aggregator Function that aggregates responses from one or more suite target services

com.webreach.mirth.model.CodeTemplate.name: updateMessageServiceStatusInDB
com.webreach.mirth.model.CodeTemplate.tooltip: Updates the caBIG Integration Hub's MESSAGE table with the status for a specific messageID

com.webreach.mirth.model.CodeTemplate.name: invokeDelegationService
com.webreach.mirth.model.CodeTemplate.tooltip: Invokes the caGrid Credential Delegation Service and returns a security Subject

com.webreach.mirth.model.CodeTemplate.name: recordMessageProcessingError
com.webreach.mirth.model.CodeTemplate.tooltip: Sets variable such that further message processing is filtered. Also records the error in the database

com.webreach.mirth.model.CodeTemplate.name: validatePayload
com.webreach.mirth.model.CodeTemplate.tooltip: Validates message payload and returns an error if the validation failes. Returns nothing if the validation is successful
